reviewtext: This lens have really delivered the versatility it promised. I have taken pictures of my friend, who is my neighbor, from about 100 yards away and the quality of the picture was as if I was within 10 feet of him.  Its a nice lens and I would recommend it to anyone who doubts the amount of satisfaction they will receive  from their investment.Otto G.
summary: Canon EF 75-300mm f/4-5.6 III Telephoto Zoom Lens for Canon SLR Cameras
